description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Project_PortfolioObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Project_PortfolioObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Project_Portfolio_WWS_Data.description: The owner for this project portfolio.
The start date of the project portfolio.
The end date of the project portfolio.
The amount allocated to the project portfolio by its parent. This can only be updated by users with access to the parent project portfolio through the Manage: Project Portfolio Funding domain.

validation.validation: Select a Funding Status of Approved, Awaiting Review, Denied, or Draft.
You can only add projects to a portfolio that you have access to through the Manage: Project Portfolio domain.
Select a project that isn't billable or in progress in a project event.
Select a parent project portfolio that you have access to that isn’t itself or a child of this project portfolio.
You can't change the reporting currency of a project portfolio if it or any of the children have a funding amount assigned.
Currency should match the parent project portfolio.
Your End Date must be after the Start Date.
Enter a currency or specify a parent project portfolio.
Select a Funding Status of Approved, Awaiting Review, Denied, or Draft.
You don't have permission to update this project portfolio.
